content: just walked through Times Square and the vibes are insane  NYC's energy is unreal. gotta grab some pizza at Joe's before diving back into the finance grind.
raw_content: The energy of NYC is electrifying. Just walked through Times Square, and the lights, the sounds – it's a reminder of why I love this city. Time to dive back into the financial whirlpool, but first, a slice of pizza from Joe's.

content: just turned 22 and i'm feeling all sorts of things. last year was crazy, but now i'm back in NYC ready to dive into trading. got an interview for a quant position this week. cheers to fresh starts and new adventures
raw_content: Reflecting on turning 22 today. The past year has been a wild ride, and now, back in NYC, I'm determined to make my mark in the trading world. Got an interview lined up for a quant trading position. Here's to new beginnings.

content: So, spent the last few days diving into Rust. It's tough but pretty cool. Today, finally wrote my first function for a lil trading algo  small steps, but I'm getting there.
raw_content: Spent the last few days learning Rust. It's challenging but rewarding. Today, I wrote my first Rust function for a basic trading algorithm. Small steps, but I'm moving forward.

content: had a deep chat w/ a mentor about AI ethics in trading. it’s not just about speed, it's about fairness. really makes you think how to develop ai agents
raw_content: Just had an insightful conversation with a mentor about the ethical implications of AI in trading. It's not just about speed, it's about fairness. Makes me question how I want to build my AI agents.

content: so i got this idea to train two AI bots on different trading vibes - one on WSB memes and the other on Buffett’s wisdom. gonna be interesting to see how they clash over market moves
raw_content: Experiment setup: Training two AI models on different trading philosophies - one on WSB posts, one on Buffett's letters. Let's see how they debate markets
